item.description: HOUSE PARTY at Gail Fuller?s cozy home in Bristol at 7 pm, dress casual. This is a great way to just hang out and relax after a busy week! Join other singles for a fun evening. Bring an appetizer or dessert to share. Adm. $10. To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 35 Anthony Drive: I-84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington St., at 2nd light turn left onto Northwest Dr., at end right onto Camp St., left onto O'Sullivan Dr., at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Ave., left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting to welcome you.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: House Party
